channel.title: bHackers Store Apps
channel.description: List of all Apps as RSS Feed

item.title: 10000h
item.description: Strengthen your skills with 10000 hours rule. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: Jan Michalak <janmichalak@int.pl>

item.title: FoxCast Lite
item.description: Foxcasts is an app for subscribing to and listening to podcasts. It started off on FirefoxOS and has been twice rebuilt from the ground up using different frameworks for KaiOS and as a general web app. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: Garrett Downs
item.tags: podcasts; audio; news; Fox; Cast; Lite;

item.title: ADBroot
item.description: An easier way to root Nokia 8110 4G. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: speeduploop

item.title: AirshipCombat3D
item.description: Looking for a fun 3D action game with great graphics? Get inside the airship and enjoy challanging battles in the skies. You can navigate the ship freely in a real 3D environment. Works best with 512MB of RAM. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: Christian Waadt <contact@ays-arts.de>

item.title: K-Chess
item.description: K-Chess is unofficial lichess.org client for KaiOS Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: arma7x <ahmadmuhamad101@gmail.com>
item.tags: chess; lichess; game; arma7x; online; ajedrez;

item.title: AppBuster
item.description: Utility to safely disable/enable KaiOS pre-installed applications Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: Luxferre

item.title: Pocket ATM
item.description: Manage money in your pocket & track your spending. Pocket ATM also provide transaction statistic by daily, monthly or yearly. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: arma7x <ahmadmuhamad101@gmail.com>

item.title: Audio Visualizer
item.description: Visualize your music or voice recordings! There are 5 styles of visualization you can choose, and you can customize how the visualization looks and reacts. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: ale4710 <alego4710@vivaldi.net>

item.title: Kloud File Manager
item.description: File Manager & Kloudless app(unofficial) for KaiOS Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: arma7x <ahmadmuhamad101@gmail.com>

item.title: baka⑨player
item.description: A fanmade application for listening to music from Gensokyo Radio. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: ale4710 <alego4710@vivaldi.net>

item.title: BankiTube
item.description: Easily watch and listen to YouTube on your KaiOS device. It basically uses Invidious. The best part is that it does not use the cursor, because the cursor is a pain in the behind to use. It's called BankiTube for no special reason beside the fact I like Sekibanki. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: ale4710 <alego4710@vivaldi.net>
item.tags: YouTube; Best YouTube Player for KaiOS; Invidious; Sekibanki;

item.title: Battery Info
item.description: Shows Battery of your KaiOS devices. Version: undefined

item.description: A lightweight and fully public KaiOS tweaker for unprivileged usage. Version: undefined

item.title: ChemicalAid
item.description: Chemical reaction, a process in which one or more substances, the reactants, are converted to one or more different substances, the products. Substances are either chemical elements or compounds. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: S Aronno<https://bananahackers.net>

item.title: Chingari
item.description: Short Videos Made in India application Version: undefined

item.title: Contact search
item.description: With this app you can search your contacts, start calls and sms. I wrote it because the KaiOs standart app is extremely slow. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: perry<https://github.com/strukturart>

item.title: CoroNumbers
item.description: Track COVID-19 numbers and get info to protect yourself and others. Information is from WHO and COVID-19 API, we are not responsible for the accuracy of the information provided. Please follow the instructions of your local authorities. We have made fair use of the following data and in no way monetize this content. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: jkelol111

item.title: Free Hit Cricket
item.description: Have some fun with this Online Cum Offline Cricket Free Hit Game by Rk Tech Youtube and Ashish Suthaar. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: Rk Tech Youtube<https://doodlecricket.github.io>

item.title: DALE-8
item.description: This is a CHIP-8 platform emulator. It was completely created from scratch and initially was intended as a GerdaOS easter egg. Now, it's released as a stand-alone application into public domain. The unpacked engine source (dale.js) can be found in the src/ directory. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: Luxferre

item.title: delta.map
item.description: delta.map is a local offline and online caching client for viewing maps, weather, utilities, and more coming soon. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: LolloDev5123;

item.title: .KVP
item.description: The first KaiOS video poker game under 3K bytes (unpacked), featuring cryptographically secure random draws. Control: Center to deal/draw, 1 to 5 to hold, 6 to 0 to select bet value. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: Luxferre

item.title: .TRIS
item.description: The first KaiOS tetris game under 4096 bytes (unpacked) Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: Luxferre

item.description: Get information about commodities price, energy price, metal price, foreign exchange(also known as FX or forex) & cryptocurrencies market value. Version: undefined

item.title: K-Pocket Browser
item.description: Web Browser & Unoffical GetPocket client for KaiOS. K-Pocket Browser provide Reader View mode, parses html text(usually news and articles) and returns title & main text content without nav bars, ads, footers, or anything that isn't the main body of the text. You also can save Reader View for offline usage and read it later without internet access. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: arma7x <ahmadmuhamad101@gmail.com>

item.description: K-Todoist is a unoffical Todoist client for KaiOS Version: undefined

item.title: MobiPICO
item.description: This is a (fully unofficial, of course) port of PICO-8 fantasy console Web player/emulator, currently using the 0.2.4 engine version from the official website. It supports both plain .p8 and .p8.png cart file loading (single carts only). Since the official PICO-8 engine itself is closed-source and obfuscated, there can't be any guarantee about full compatibility or sufficient performance on any KaiOS phone model. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: Luxferre

item.title: Mocha radio
item.description: Listen to music from more than 20.000 internet radio stations streaming live right now. View album cover and song titles. Record music and listen when offline. Version: undefinedScreenshots:

item.title: SHAREit
item.description: SHAREit is popular globally for transfering and sharing files without data. Now feel FREE to enjoy your sharing time with android phone friends as well as KaiOS phone friends. The Application, the Services and all trademarks, service marks and trade names and other intellectual property rights associated therewith are, and shall remain, the property of SHAREit and its licensors, as applicable. All content related to Services, including any text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips and software, is the exclusive property of SHAREit or its licensors and is protected by applicable legislation concerning protection and preservation of intellectual property rights. All software used on the Application is the property of SHAREit or its software suppliers. Any use except as specifically permitted, including the reproduction, modification, distribution, transmission, republication, display or performance, of the content on the Application is strictly prohibited except as otherwise permitted by law. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: Smart Media4U Technology Pte.Ltd <feedback_pc@ushareit.com>

item.title: Store Client
item.description: An almost universal client for KaiOS app stores. Supports both KaiStore and B-Hackers Store. Can update apps via Self-Debugging and falls back to OmniSD method if Self-Debugging is unavailable. Spoofs your IMEI and other personal data when accessing KaiStore. Version: undefined
item.dc:creator: Affe Null <affenull2345@gmail.com>

item.title: Talking bot
item.description: This is a stupid talking bot. Hold call key and talk(up to 10 seconds). Then wait up to ~30 seconds for a response from your phone(it will talk!). Donations are welcome, especially a server to host the API which is currently hosted on Heroku using a free account. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: Farooq Karimi Zadeh <hapu@riseup.net>
item.tags: fun; AI; chatbot; talkbot; entertainment; talking bot;

item.title: TeleKram
item.description: a fork of Telegram Web for KaiOS. Supports dpad navigation and push notifications. Note, the app is in Beta expect bugs and slow performance. some parts of the app doesn't support dpad navigation, to enable cursor press 5. Version: undefinedScreenshots:
item.dc:creator: arma7x <ahmadmuhamad101@gmail.com>
